findings.title: Excessive use of digits can be avoided
findings.description: The code has a large number of digits that makes it difficult to review and reduces the readability of the code.

findings.title: External Visibility should be preferred
findings.description: Functions that are never called throughout the contract should be marked as external visibility instead of public visibility to achieve gas optimization.

findings.title: Redundant comparison to boolean constants
findings.description: Boolean constants can directly be used in conditional statements or require statements.

findings.title: Function initiates token transfer without checking the contract’s balance.
findings.description: The redeem function transfers vested token amount to the caller without checking if the contract has sufficient balance, leading to inadequate error messages if the user tries to withdraw more tokens than available.
